t: Arris International - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Arris International Limited (styled as ARRIS) was an American telecommunications equipment company engaged in data, video and telephony systems for homes and businesses. On April 4, 2019, Arris was acquired by network infrastructure provider CommScope. Arris now is a brand name by CommScope.

s: September 19, 2024 - Today, ARRIS is a leading provider of cable modems and broadband technology, while Motorola focuses on its core mobile phone and networking businesses. ARRIS manufactures and sells cable modems under its own brand, and the company is responsible for supporting and maintaining these products.
